Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials

official_title: A bill to require the Consumer Product Safety Commission to conduct rulemaking proceeding to ensure uniform treatment among the States for fireworks.

summary.text: Directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission to conduct a rulemaking proceeding to: (1) ensure uniform treatment under the Federal Hazardous Substances Act by States of fireworks; (2) ensure the protection of public health and safety from the hazards of fireworks; and (3) determine the extent to which fireworks should be considered a hazardous substance subject to the Federal Hazardous Substances Act.

titles.title: A bill to require the Consumer Product Safety Commission to conduct rulemaking proceeding to ensure uniform treatment among the States for fireworks.
